item.title: Former Sarasota postal worker sentenced to 7 years in prison for 2023 check fraud case

item.description: The University of Tennessee - Chattanooga is on lockdown as police investigate a possible active shooter situation on campus.

item.title: Erin pulls away while Fernand waits in the wings
item.description: A First Alert Weather heads up for the next several days as onshore flow and an increase in moisture will bring a timing change for rain.
